cleaned_text: Essential Oils Essential oils A popular ingredient to add aroma, essential oils can be found in a number of products. Commonly used in [air fresheners](https://www.walgreens.com/q/air-freshener) and skincare products such as [massage oils](https://www.walgreens.com/q/massage-oils), essential oils are popular for their strong [fragrances](https://www.walgreens.com/store/c/beauty/fragrance/ID=310515-tier2general). Essential oils can also be known as volatile oils. Shop Walgreens.com to find your favorite essential oil scent in products including [air freshener refills](https://www.walgreens.com/q/air-freshener-refills) and [massage therapy oils](https://www.walgreens.com/q/massage-therapy-oil). Essential Oils for Aromatherapy Many aromatherapy products take advantage of essential oils to help create certain moods. Essential oils are used to soothe, calm, or inspire in [soaps](https://www.walgreens.com/q/soap), perfumes, and [cosmetics](https://www.walgreens.com/store/c/beauty/cosmetics/ID=310512-tier2general). You can even find essential oils used in some [household cleaning products](https://www.walgreens.com/q/household-cleaning-products) for more pleasant scents than traditional cleaners.
